statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_status = 'SUCCESS' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 100.50, transaction_type = 'REFUND' WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_amount = 100.75, transaction_status = 'Completed' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_type = 'Refund', transaction_status = 'Cancelled', transaction_amount = 50.25 WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE metadata SET action = 'Approved', timestamp = NOW() WHERE metadata_id = '65432100-12ab-34cd-56ef-7890fedcba98';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50, description = 'Payment for services' WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
UPDATE metadata SET user_id = '4a2198e9-214b-4eed-8c9b-7492b8d3fd1d', action = 'Approved' WHERE transaction_id = '06743292-02eb-4c8e-8b78-3b1267a476f4';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1000.50, description = 'Updated transaction details' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE audit_trail SET user_id = 54321, action = 'Updated' WHERE audit_id = 67890;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50, description = 'Updated transaction' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE audit_trail SET action = 'Approved', timestamp = '2023-07-12 10:30:00', user_id = 5678 WHERE audit_id = 98765;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1500.75 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transaction_metadata SET metadata_value = 'Completed' WHERE metadata_id = 2001;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 1500.75, transaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE user_accounts SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2003;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.00, description = 'Payment Received' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE user_account SET balance = 1500.00, account_type = 'Checking' WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE transaction_history SET description = 'Payment Received' WHERE transaction_id = 101;
UPDATE user_account SET balance = balance + 500 WHERE account_number = '1234567890';
